messages.private_welcome: Welcome to our Trading Community! 📈 To provide you with personalized trading recommendations, please answer a few questions:
messages.admin_auto_welcome: Hey there, and welcome to VFX! 👋💸 Firstly, apologies for the delayed response — we've been absolutely inundated with requests due to the high demand for the VFX strategy. We truly appreciate your patience and are excited to have you on board! 🏦 Account Setup: • If you've already created your Vortex FX account, great! 📊 • If you haven't registered yet, you can do that here (it's free): 👉 Register Now 🚀 Ready to get started? Use our guided setup below to get your account configured perfectly for your trading style! We're glad to have you with us — let's build and grow together! 📈🔥
messages.signals_auto_welcome: Hey there, and welcome to VFX Signals! 👋📊 Firstly, apologies for the delayed response — we've been absolutely inundated with requests due to the high demand for the VFX signals. We truly appreciate your patience and are excited to have you on board! Account Setup: - If you've already created your Vortex FX account, please reply with your MT5 account number so we can get you set up right away. ✅ - If you haven't registered yet, you can do that here (it's free): 👉 Register Now To help us tailor your signals service, please also answer the following: 1️⃣ What risk profile would you like on your account? (Low / Medium / High) 2️⃣ How much capital have you funded your account with? 3️⃣ Have you used a signals service before? (Yes / No) 4️⃣ What is your Vortex FX MT5 account number? 🔢 We're glad to have you with us — let's trade and grow together! 📊 🔥
